name: Pin the Tail on Christmas!
description:
Can you get a perfect 500 score?

Bringing the game everyone loves in "Pin the tail to the Donkey" to the digital world! 

This game was made for Day 1 of Advent of Games 2022, an amazing game development collaboration where 25 Game Devs make a game everyday from 1st - 25th of December!

It does work I promise, might just take a while (10 seconds at most) to load!

Want to see how the game was made? 

(The random goat at the end was generated by DALLE because I was tired, don't question it...)

See the full Advent of Games 2022 Playlist here! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLi_sI-6txMOGwKshso1ONl0mmKxTi8chv
